<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Green Empathy](/Feats.aspx?ID=326) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 136 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[leaf order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You can communicate with plants and fungi on a basic level and use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on them and to make very simple [Requests](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of them. Non-creature plants and fungi typically can't fulfill most requests you might ask of them unless you have access to other magic such as [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294). Because of your affiliation with the leaf order, plants and fungi have a sense that you support them, so you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your check to Make a Request of a plant or fungus using Green Empathy.

<title level="2">Green Empathy leads to...</title>
[Green Tongue](/Feats.aspx?ID=341)
name: Green Empathy
